Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.1 Ganthaduka » 5.1.1 Paṭiccavāra » 5.1.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 5.1.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
8.
1631Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
